WorkItem.Description:
When using max on an int and a double, the order of parameters influences the outcome. 

the following equations produce a different outcome:

max(1, 2.01)
max(2.01, 1)
WorkItem.Summary: function max uses only first parameter to determine precision

Comments.Message:
You can make your own max function on the EvaluateFunction event handler.
But you are right, it is a bug.
